title: Software Development Learnership
description: Join our 12-month software development learnership program to gain hands-on experience in full-stack web development. You will learn modern technologies including JavaScript, Python, and cloud deployment.

title: Data Science Learnership
description: Gain valuable skills in data analysis, machine learning, and AI applications. This learnership includes hands-on projects with real-world datasets and mentorship from industry experts.
requirements: Matric with Mathematics and Physical Science

title: Financial Management Learnership
description: Develop essential skills in financial management, accounting principles, and business administration. This program includes preparation for professional certification exams.

title: Digital Marketing Learnership
description: Learn the latest digital marketing strategies including SEO, social media marketing, content creation, and analytics. Work on real campaigns for actual clients.
requirements: Interest in marketing and social media

title: Mechanical Engineering Learnership
description: Practical training in mechanical engineering principles, including design, manufacturing processes, and maintenance procedures. Includes industry certifications.
requirements: Matric with Mathematics and Physical Science

title: Retail Management Learnership
description: Comprehensive training in retail operations, customer service, inventory management, and team leadership. Includes rotation through various departments.

title: Hospitality Management Learnership
description: Learn all aspects of hospitality management including front desk operations, food and beverage service, event planning, and customer relations.

title: Healthcare Administration Learnership
description: Training in healthcare administration, patient records management, medical billing, and healthcare facility operations.
